name: jsFun

scripts.test: ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/ --reporter dot --require mocha-clean; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint scope/index.js; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint context/index.js; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint prototypes/index.js
scripts.testPrototypes: ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/prototype-test.js --reporter dot --require mocha-clean; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint scope/index.js; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint context/index.js; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint prototypes/index.js
scripts.testScope: ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/scope-test.js --reporter dot --require mocha-clean; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint scope/index.js; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint context/index.js; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint prototypes/index.js
scripts.testContext: ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/context-test.js --reporter dot --require mocha-clean; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint scope/index.js; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint context/index.js; ./node_modules/.bin/eslint prototypes/index.js

author: Turing School of Software and Design
